MajorClaims.MC1: this is a worrying tread which has negative impact on children
MajorClaims.MC2: media should shift its focus from covering celebrities to elsewhere

Claims.C1: This gives children the idea that it is not necessary to study hard at school for a better career and earning a living
Claims.C2: without proper parenting, children may perceive that this is the cool life people are supposed to be living
Claims.C3: some celebrities, e.g. writers, passionate entrepreneurs are good examples to children

Premises.P1: The first impression of the celebrities seems that they are rich while not having to work hard
Premises.P2: they will not value other people's hard work and take everything for granted
Premises.P3: It is not uncommon to see on the media that some of them are committing to crimes or misbehaving such as being addicted to drugs or alcohols, having messy sex lives
Premises.P4: not all celebrities are role models
Premises.P5: they share fascinating stories or how to pursue their goal by doing something that has a meaning to them and may change the world
